Package activity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommentPageActivity
    An activity will display the content and other info of an specific comment object.
    EditPageActivity
    An activity will allow user to edit a specific comment
    HomePageActivity
    Activity which mostly contains the view of top level comments
    LoginViewActivity
    An Activity which allows user type their userName and login in to the App.
    PublishActivity
    An activity which allows user to publish a new top level comment or reply to a specific comment.
    ResetUserNameActivity
    An Activity which allows the user reset his user name.
    SortOptionActivity
    An activity will allow user to choose the sort option for list of comments.
    UserInfoPageActivity
    An Activity allows user view his own profile including guest.
    ViewCacheCommentActivity
    Provide the user view content of any comments he set as favorite and the comment's all replies.
    ViewFavActivity
    Provide the user view a list of the comments he set as favorite.
